title: Game/server crash?
body:
so i just wanted to start a game and i am stuck already for 10mins on the connecting screen (the screen where you see what char what player has, etc)
if i leave/restart my pc wil that be a reason to get leavebuster or whatever it was called again

replies.body: Hey there, champion select doesn't last that long so it sounds like you lost sync and were left behind.  :(  This would result in a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), which can escalate if it continues.  It may be best to stick to custom games for now and use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and clear up the instability.  Let me know if you have any questions!
